task.title: How to repair a bicycle puncture
task.shortdesc: How to repair a bicycle puncture. Use the following instructions

taskbody.context: You can change any tire with these basic instructions
taskbody.prereq: gather glue, rubber patch, water bowl, air pump, rag

step.cmd: remove the tire from the bicycle frame
step.stepxmp: most bicycles have clips if yours does not find the appropriate spanner
step.steptroubleshooting: be careful removing the tire from the bicycle tube

step.cmd: inflate the tyre using the air pump, then rotate the inner tube in the bowl of water
step.stepresult: air bubbles will appear in the water on the surface of the tube

step.cmd: dry the inner tube with the rag
step.info: ensure it is completely dry to touch

choices.choice: if you have light sand paper, lightly rub the area of the puncture

step.cmd: apply the glue and then the rubber patch
Allow the patch to cure for 60 minutes
